title: [K-12] Discussion-Based Language Education Design for a Virtual Design Studio

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design processes and experience with digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing the cultivation of practical skills that combine design discussions and language communication in non-face-to-face environments

learning_goals: Learners can lead critical discussions on design concepts in virtual environments three or more times.
Learners can document design project feedback with over 80% accuracy using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can structure the process of solving multidisciplinary design problems through verbal communication in four or more stages.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
